name: BetterCarPeople
0:
”Alexa, ask Better Car People to answer my sales leads”
”Alexa, ask Better Car People to answer my service leads”
”Alexa, ask Better Car People to resume my normal schedule”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: better car people
des: This skill requires an account with OvernightBDC or BCP for Sales, powered by Better Car People. You can ask to start or stop answering your leads, or to resume your normal schedule. For more information, see http://bettercarpeople.com.
